Text: Words cannot express how grateful I am. This is a gold-mine treasure trove!
Might very well be the best music torrent I have ever downloaded. Perfect audio, and for once the track ID's are in perfect order. And of course Kate Bush is just plain wonderful. Thanks!

Thanks for this compilation. I own all the 7" & 12" and many of her cds, including the TWW box set. I wanted to create a playlist of all her singles, b-sides, mixes in chronological order (unlike TWS). You, my friend, have saved me the trouble and expense. Big thanks! Is a FLAC or WAV alternative coming next??
